Sentencas: Transients in a load have a significant impact on the performance and durability of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system.
Titulo: Predictive control of SOFC based on a GA-RBF neural network model

Sentencas: One of the main reasons is that the fuel utilization changes drastically due to the load change.
Titulo: Predictive control of SOFC based on a GA-RBF neural network model

Sentencas: Therefore, in order to guarantee the fuel utilization to operate within a safe range, a nonlinear model predictive control (MPC) method is proposed to control the stack terminal voltage as a proper constant in this paper.
Titulo: Predictive control of SOFC based on a GA-RBF neural network model

Sentencas: The nonlinear predictive controller is based on an improved radial basis function (RBF) neural network identification model.
Titulo: Predictive control of SOFC based on a GA-RBF neural network model

Sentencas: During the process of modeling, the genetic algorithm (GA) is used to optimize the parameters of RBF neural networks.
Titulo: Predictive control of SOFC based on a GA-RBF neural network model

Sentencas: And then a nonlinear predictive control algorithm is applied to track the voltage of the SOFC.
Titulo: Predictive control of SOFC based on a GA-RBF neural network model

Sentencas: Compared with the constant fuel utilization control method, the simulation results show that the nonlinear predictive control algorithm based on the GA-RBF model performs much better.
Titulo: Predictive control of SOFC based on a GA-RBF neural network model
